abstract: Carl Medjani (Arabic: كارل مدجاني‎) (born 15 May 1985 in Lyon, France) is an Algerian international football player who currently plays as a defender for Valenciennes FC, on loan from AS Monaco FC, and the Algeria national team.
comment: Carl Medjani (Arabic: كارل مدجاني‎) (born 15 May 1985 in Lyon, France) is an Algerian international football player who currently plays as a defender for Valenciennes FC, on loan from AS Monaco FC, and the Algeria national team.
